text: Riots happen when many people meet to be violent.riot. www.Britannica.com. Retrieved December 26, 2021. This can happen after sports events, during demonstrations. or as a protest. Rioters damage cars and buildings and attack other people, among other things. The police are brought out to stop riots. In the Western world, they use shields and fight with soft weapons, for example with water cannons or rubber bullets, as well as with batons. When riots really get out of control, the police also use tools that can hurt people, such as tear gas and pepper spray,Tear gas and pepper spray: What protesters need to know. www.cen.acs.org. Retrieved December 26, 2021. and put the rioters under arrest. Riots are very dangerous and sometimes lead to deaths. There have been many riots all over the world, especially in England, Northern Ireland, the United States, India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Australia, France, Hong Kong, and Mainland China. == References ==
